name: SKReferenceNode
desc: A node that's defined in an archived .sks file.

items.name: init(url: URL)
items.desc: Creates a reference node from a URL.

items.name: init(url: URL?)
items.desc: Initializes a reference node from a URL.

items.name: init(fileNamed: String)
items.desc: Creates a reference node from a file in the app’s main bundle.

items.name: init(fileNamed: String?)
items.desc: Initializes a reference node from a file in the app’s main bundle.

items.name: init?(coder: NSCoder)
items.desc: A method that initializes a reference node from an archive.

items.name: func resolve()
items.desc: Loads the reference node’s content and adds it as a new child node.

items.name: func didLoad(SKNode?)
items.desc: A method called by SpriteKit after the reference node’s contents are loaded.
